welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Budenheim, a charming town known for its picturesque vineyards and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Air Base Airport is used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with limited complimentary access for non-EU citizens.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
